title: Something about summoner' ID
body:
Hi dear Riot whoever can see this. 
  I used to have a account with my unique summoner name, however that acc got permant ban. so that which mean that ID is permant gone as well. we cant change the orginal account because it cant be login.  so i wanna ask are there any chance to delete the original ID when a account got permant ban. (My  account was get ban like 4-5 years ago by lending out, so pls dont judge me a cheatter or bad person({{item:3070}} o{{item:3070}} )). so that we can get the ID we want, because when the account is getting permant ban is also meanning this account is not gonna get use anymore. what i want is the ID was in that account. so i just wanna ask about this, are there any chance to "get the ID back".

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ#h1q9

>We can swap Summoner Names between accounts manually, but only if you have the required 1300 RP or 13,900 BE in your main account to pay for the transfer. Please note that you can only swap Summoner Names that are on the same server.

>If you would like to swap your Summoner name from one of your accounts to another, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the subject "Summoner Name Swap" and send us the following information for both of your accounts:

>SUBJECT: Summoner Name Swap

>ACCOUNT ONE
* Your account name (What you log in to the game with)
* Your Summoner name (What other players see in game)
* Which server you play on (NA, EU West, or EU Nordic & East)
* Email used to register the account:

>ACCOUNT TWO
* Your account name (What you log in to the game with)
* Your Summoner name (What other players see in game)
* Which server you play on (NA, EU West, or EU Nordic & East)
* Email used to register the account:
thank you for replying me. Just cant find the subject" Summoner Name Swap" on the submit a ticket bar. 0.0
Hmm, if there isn't a specific category for it anymore, just submit it as the general "I have a question about League of Legends" with "Summoner Name Swap" as your subject line.
Ty alot again. ill do it. u are nice man !{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
